title: Oxycodone vs. sufentanil combined with quadratus lumborum block vs. transverse abdominis plane block in laparoscopic major gastrointestinal surgery: A randomized factorial trial protocol
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Guo-wang Yang, Min-yuan Zhuang, Hai-jing Shi, Xiao-yang Song, Hong Liu, Fu-hai Ji, Ke Peng
